text: Vale az mijoni onon rosixoni dar ilm [ulamoi jahud] va mu'minon [ja'ne onon, ki] ʙa on ci ʙar tu nozil sudaast va on ci ki pes az tu nozil sudaast, imon meovarand va [hamcunin] namozguzoronu zakotdihandagon va imonovarandagon ʙa Alloh taolo va ruzi ʙozpasin, ʙa [hamai] inho podosi ʙuzurge xohem dod
